```{r}
## Library Declarations
library(igraph)

### 2008 Data
edges1_dataframe<-read.csv("1-edges.csv")
head(edges1_dataframe)
names(edges1_dataframe)<-c("Node1","Node2","Strength_of_Interaction")

## Calculate number of nodes
num_nodes<-nrow(read.csv("nodes.csv"))
el<-matrix(nrow= nrow(edges1_dataframe), ncol=2)
el[,1]<-edges1_dataframe$Node1
el[,2]<-edges1_dataframe$Node2
head(el)
g=graph.data.frame(el)
#g
contact_matrix1<-get.adjacency(g,type="both")
```
